com.ea.orbit.actors.runtime

Class ActorReference<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ea.orbit.actors.runtime.ActorReference<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the IActor of IActorObserver implemented by this reference.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAddressable, Serializable

    public abstract class ActorReference<T>
extends Object
implements Serializable, IAddressable
    Base class for IActor or IActorObserver references.

    References classes ares automatically generated with runtime byte code generation

    The reference classes extends the IActor or IActorObserver interfaces and implement their methods as remote calls that are forwarded to the IRuntime

    References are java.io.Serializable and orbit also provides a jackson module to handle their serialization to json

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • _interfaceId

        protected abstract int _interfaceId()
        Implemented by subclasses to return the interface id.

        This is not exposed as a public method to avoid clashes with the methods from implemented interfaces

        Returns:
        the implemented interface id

      • _interfaceClass

        protected abstract Class<T> _interfaceClass()
        Implemented by subclasses to return the actor or actor observer interface implemented by this reference.
        Returns:
        the implemented interface

      • invoke

        protected <R> Task<R> invoke(boolean oneWay,
                             int methodId,
                             Object[] params)
        Invokes a remote method.
        Type Parameters:
        R - generic parameter to make the compiler happy.
        Parameters:
        oneWay - if the target should send the response back.
        methodId - the target method id
        params - parameters for the method, must all be serializable.
        Returns:
        a task that will contain the returned value, or if one-way a task indicating if the message could be send.

      • getInterfaceId

        public static int getInterfaceId(ActorReference<?> reference)
        Utility method used by the framework and framework extensions to retrieve the integer identifier of the IActor or IActorObserver interface implemented by this reference.

        This is not exposed as an instance method to avoid clashes with the methods from implemented interfaces

        Parameters:
        reference - the reference being inspected
        Returns:
        the implemented interface id

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the actor id

        Returns:
        the implemented interface

      • getAddress

        public static INodeAddress getAddress(ActorReference<?> reference)
        Utility method used by the framework and framework extensions to retrieve the target node address for this reference. The target address will be null for regular actors and non null for actor observers.

        This is not exposed as an instance method to avoid clashes with the methods from implemented interfaces

        Parameters:
        reference - the reference being inspected
        Returns:
        the node address where the actor observer resides

      • setAddress

        public static void setAddress(ActorReference<?> reference,
                              INodeAddress nodeAddress)
        Utility method used by the framework and framework extensions to set the target node address for this reference.

        This is not exposed as an instance method to avoid clashes with the methods from implemented interfaces

        Parameters:
        reference - the reference being inspected
        nodeAddress - the node address where the actor observer resides
